name: Drone Landing 2D
description:
As a pilot of a drone, you must prove your dexterity. Land the Drone precisely on the target platform. 

Always pay attention to the obstacles and dangers that will put you on a tricky test in the course of the 40 levels and bring the drone to the landing platform.

Drone Landing 2D Game
- 40 levels divided into 4 levelpacks
- Crack the highscore and improve your time
- Countless challenges
- Real flight and physics behavior of the drone

Ready for takeoff? Good luck!
